column3: that shit was wack as fuck  i was like 'you won why are you posting your text message just chill take your w and if you feel you didn't deserve it go get better  make better music it felt cheap it didn't feel genuine why do that why feel guilt you think those guys would pay homage to you if they won  this is how the world works he made a brand of music that appealed to more people than me hov kanye and kendrick whether people wanna say it's racial or whether it's just the fact that he tapped into something we can't tap into that's just how the cards fall own your shit  to name just kendrick that shit made me feel funny no in that case you robbed everybody we all need text messages
